originalText.text: I have used Wink since they first came out. I upgraded to a Wink 2 and haven't regretted it! The Wink Hub is the best all in one hub on the market. Recently I had a problem with one of my devices and they did a great job supporting the products. Thank you to your team and I can't wait for the next innovative product you guys come up with!!

originalText.text:
Transitioning long time users to an hastily announced subscription model in the middle of a national economic crisis is a TACKY bait-n-switch.
Offering zero usability for products purchased is disgusting... your app has been terrible for years and you think I'm gonna cave and pay you to use my AC, you are mistaken. We'll be taking our money elsewhere. üñïüèªüñïüèªüñïüèªüñïüèª

originalText.text: Bait and Switch company- Makes you pay for expensive hardware claiming it is FREE to use, then change/charge Subscription Fee to use- BYE WINK! Switching to Samsung Smart Things, Less Expensive Hardware, No Subscription Fees.

originalText.text: I have had the Wink hub for almost one year. After six months my Honeywell Thermostat would not link to the Wink Hub. I contacted Wink support in August of 2019 and after 66 email exchanges Wink was not able to give me resolution to my issue. I would not buy again
